issue.title: Struct Array reads limited support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-915](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-915). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add limited support for reading Struct Array in pyarrow, with
values being represented as dictionaries.
